casebody.data:
HOLLISTER INCORPORATED, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CONVATEC INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2011-1617. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. June 19, 2012. Jeffrey W. Sarles, Mayer Brown, LLP, of Chicago, IL, argued for plaintiff-appel*905lant. With him on the brief was David M. Berger. Robert S. Mallín, Brinks Hofer Gilson & Lione, of Chicago, IL, argued for defendant-appellee. With him on the brief were Cynthia A. Homan, Dominic P. Zanfardino and Raquel C. Rodriguez.

NEWMAN, MOORE, and O’MALLEY, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This Cause having been heard and considered, it is

Ordered and Adjudged:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
